response.overview: Baridin (Ao Happiness) is a poor young man who lives in Cirebon, he lives with his mother, mbok wangsih (Nita Hinduan). Baridin's father died when Baridin was 40 days old. They both had to survive in very difficult economic conditions. When he grew up, Baridin fell in love with a woman named Suratminah (Aurellia Siregar), the daughter of the richest and most respected person in her village. The difference between the two of them is very striking in terms of bibit, bebet and bobot. Pucuk di cinta ulampun tiba Baridin accidentally crossed paths with Suratminah on the street. And at that time Baridin declared his love for Suratminah. However, fate was not on Baridin's side, Suratminah had flatly rejected his love. What will Baridin do next?
response.title: Ajian Kemat Jaran Guyang
